title: Microsoft Teams: In-app Teams devices store experience
description: With the Teams device store experience inside the Teams app, customers can easily discover and purchase certified Teams devices for personal or shared use cases â€“ headsets, web cameras, desk phones, Teams Rooms, and more. Explore devices in categories, use search or filters to find desired device, and purchase all through the familiar Microsoft Teams interface. We are introducing a new experience for small businesses to purchase devices directly within Teams, businesses in the US and Canada will now be able to complete their purchase without leaving the app.
